item.title: CVE-2024-7786|2024-09-04T14:17:10.670Z -- unknown -- sensei%20lms
item.description: The Sensei LMS WordPress plugin before 4.24.2 does not properly protect some its REST API routes, allowing unauthenticated attackers to leak email templates.
